body:
Hiya guys, I'm Yamatzu! I'm a very good PvPer and loves to play Avicus! Recently I resisted on the Forums! I'm currently just using my account not my Bro's (OldManTigerMask) because I don't want to ruin his statistics although its not that good!

FAQ:

How were you introduced to Avicus?
I was Introduced by my brother then introduced my self to the forums and ever since enjoying my self!

Is your bro annoying?
Grr I hate to say this... YES he is VERY!!! Especially when he joins teamspeak and says that I can't join it too.

Do you like Avicus?
Why you ask? I don't like it... I LOVE IT!!

Erm.. are you going to make pointless threads like your bro?
No? Does he really make pointless threads? I have heard he gets in trouble on the forums by creating Bumps and a little more! But really? POINTLESS? How dare you call my brother's SHOW YOUR SCREENSHOTS pointless...

Are you a boy?
Certainly not I don't want to be one and I will never be one!

Are you annoying like your bro?
I don't think so. At lease I hope not I try not to be. If I am please tell me and I'll try and Improve!

Any other questions about me? Ask Away!

title: Hiya / Bonjour / Caro Avicus!

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! Feel free to ask the staff any question or tell them any concerns!

replies.body: Hi there, welcome to the forums!

replies.body:
Heya! Your brother doesn't seem bad, no idea what everyone else is going on about. 

But yea, welcome! x)

EDIT: I must learn how to grammar. ^-^

replies.body: Hey Yamatzu! Welcome to the Avicus forums! You seem really nice! :)
replies.body_tagged: Hey Yamatzu! Welcome to the Avicus forums! You seem really nice! :)

replies.body:
Wow, Thanks guys! I really am excited to see what I can post. Regarding your question kycraft is no I ain't in any clan yet
Also TntDude not that bad at grammar
Another question is Bumping posts bad if on topic?
replies.body_tagged:
Wow, Thanks guys! I really am excited to see what I can post. Regarding your question kycraft is no I ain't in any clan yet
Also TntDude not that bad at grammar
Another question is Bumping posts bad if on topic?

replies.body:
Welcome to the forums! I'm sure you'll find great people here. :D

EDIT: Bumping topics is not bad as long as your response is on topic.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Welcome to the Avicus Network!

I can already tell you're a very helpful player! Woo!

Here are the rules. Read them and follow them accordingly :)

If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
We'll be more than happy to help you out!

:)
